thread.section_title: Panda Security opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Panda Security | www.pandasecurity.com
thread.title: J. Public
thread.title_full: Panda Security evaluado por J. Public

author: J. Public
title: J. Public
text:
Incompatibility with Windows 10 contributed to crashing my harddrive. Panda Technical "Support" acknowledged this and suggested reloading Windows as a possible fix! Reloading the OS to make their lousy software work!
I've written repeatedly to Customer Service (sic) and they won't reply; they just keep sending the same tech reply through Tech support.
And this was my 2nd year as a paid user.
AVOID at all costs!
